overview:
Work Experience May. 2006 â€“ till present Maktoob Inc. Job Title: Technical Team Leader. Job Description: Leading team consist of 11 developer, 3 developers working on PHP, 6 developers working on Asp.net, 1 Developer working on MySQL, and 1 developer working on Ms SQL.

  • I was responsible about create periodic reports for the work and completed tasks.
  • Working on Search Engine Optimization.
  • Development and Research for the Advertising System.
  • Mange the Projects development process.
  • Tuning and mange Windows servers.
  • Tuning Websites performance.

Jan. 2003 â€“ April. 2006 Email Solutions Job Title: Web Developer. Job Description: I was working as part of a development team which consist of 5 developers.

  • I was responsible about web pages development; also adapt the HTML Design and the CSS.
  • I have worked on the all the development tiers, and building admin area for the sites.
  • I have worked on Smart Device Application, implement inventory system.
  • I have worked on Smart Card and Memory Card applications, implement Payroll system.

Education & Certificate B.Sc. Software Engineering Applied Science University, 2000 â€“ 2004 MCSD, Microsoft Certified Solution Developer Microsoft, 2004 - 2005

Software Skills Applications Visual Studio.net, Visual Studio 6, Visual Source Safe, Visio, Microsoft Project, Rational Rose, Request Pro, Windows, Linux RedHat, IIS 6, Apache, Zend, VBulletin, Microsoft Office, and Dream Waver
Platforms DOS, Windows 9x, Windows Server 2003, Windows XP, Linux, and Unix Languages C/C++, VB.NET, C#, ASP.Net, JavaScript, and PHP 5 DBMS MySQL 4 - 5, Microsoft SQL Server 2000 â€“ 2005, and Microsoft Access

References You can find the references in Linked In http://www.linkedin.com/pub/9/356/685 My Posts in ASP.NET Forums http://forums.asp.net/search/SearchResults.aspx?q=Dr.Osika&o=Relevance
